cobyqa.optimize.Models.ceq_hessp¶

method

optimize.Models.ceq_hessp(x, i)[source]¶

Evaluate the product of the Hessian matrix of an equality constraint function of the model with any vector.

Parameters
xnumpy.ndarray, shape (n,)

Vector to be left-multiplied by the Hessian matrix of the quadratic function.

iint

Index of the equality constraint to be considered.

Returns
numpy.ndarray, shape (n,)

Value of the product of the Hessian matrix of the i-th equality constraint function of the model with the vector x.

previous

cobyqa.optimize.Models.ceq_hess

next
